short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows configuration of robux display on Roblox.com, including hiding values and showing devex amounts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Showing both your balance of Robux and its devex value.
- Showing ONLY the devex value in USD.
- Hiding your Robux balance.
